name: HBP_STMT_PRINT_ADDR
description: This table stores the billing address of the guarantor for a given Hospital Billing statement print record.

columns.name: HBP_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the bill print record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: BILL_ADDR
columns.description: The billing address of the guarantor.
